company.title: Matthew Lawrence
company.description: My name is Matthew Lawrence and I make games, videos, and other media. My main project is Enchain, a small, experimental first person shooter which I develop alone.
company.history: I am currently a student majoring in Computer Science. Before college, I would spend my time absorbing YouTube videos about Unity and Blender, slowly picking up on the process of game development. I often joined the Ludum Dare game jam, trying out various genres and some overambitious ideas. At first I wasnâ€™t familiar with programming at all, but that changed when I took on a larger project where I could Google search away at small problems every day, building a little multiplayer FPS game called Bionic. That journey taught me so much about programming and Blender that I was comfortable making most of my game content on my own. Since then, I have continued to join game jams every now and then, but mostly working on Enchain.
